e3357417-aa67-47e2-9515-b46fde45e22a.description: Earners of the Maternal Mental Health Global Advocacy badge have demonstrated in-depth understanding of the impact of perinatal mood and anxiety disorders and traumatic childbirth. Informed by evidence-based knowledge, they can describe the most common disorders occurring in pregnancy and the postpartum period, including symptoms, risk factors, and effects of these disorders on birthing people and their children. They identify resources for supporting the health and wellbeing of birthing people.
e3357417-aa67-47e2-9515-b46fde45e22a.name: Maternal Mental Health Advocate

badge_template_activities.title: Earners completed a rigorous four-week course reviewing and understanding current evidence-based knowledge regarding the types of perinatal mood and anxiety disorders occurring in pregnancy and the postpartum period including symptoms, risk factors, and effects of these disorders on birthing people and their children.

skills.name: Community Ally: Evidence-based Maternal Mental Health Resources
Engaged Awareness and Advocacy for Birthing People

aab02ce2-b17f-47c7-95b8-4d86245ed58a.description: RCR participants complete nine modules associated with global research ethics and aligned with the responsible conduct of research topic areas required by the US federal funding agencies: 1) collaborative research, 2) conflicts of interest, 3) data acquisition and management, 4) human research protections, 5) animal welfare, 6) mentoring, 7) responsible authorship, 8) peer review, and 9) research misconduct.
aab02ce2-b17f-47c7-95b8-4d86245ed58a.name: Responsible Conduct of Research

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 9 modules of independing work aligned with global and national research ethics. Participants must also attend a live session with a national research expert.
Complete 9 modules of independing work aligned with global and national research ethics. Participants must also attend a live session with a national research expert.

50b5e630-c41b-4158-9981-19f6df9bc48f.description: The essential capabilities of team leaders and individual contributors in this ever evolving milieu include the five core leadership strategies in alignment with the United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. Earners participate in weekly live discussions and leadership development exercises. The program culminates in a leadership action plan incorporating the five core leadership strategies to help learners become inspired leaders and change agents.
50b5e630-c41b-4158-9981-19f6df9bc48f.name: 21st Century Social Impact Strategies for Global Leaders

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 5 modules, each with a weekly discussion. Earners end the program with successful completion of a global leadership plan.

c04a112b-e8b1-4100-95fd-87e8da0684c6.description: Earners learn how to coach their teams to high performance by learning and applying successful coaching strategies. Strategies include effective coaching questions, overcoming obstacles, staging performance, confirming team outcomes and implementing a project cycle.
c04a112b-e8b1-4100-95fd-87e8da0684c6.name: Leading Agile & Resilient Teams

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have 3 months to complete a virtual self paced course consisting of instructional videos and workbook exercises.
